short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple daily assistant that summarises online articles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing MagicRecap, a Chrome extension that summarizes articles and YouTube videos, saving you time and increasing productivity.

Key features:
• Quickly and easily generates summaries of lengthy articles and videos.
• Allows you to extract key points without having to read or watch the entire content.
• Ideal for students, busy professionals, and anyone who wants to stay informed without spending hours.
• Simple to use - install the extension, click on the icon, and the summary is automatically generated.
• Provides valuable assistance in staying updated on the latest news and trends.

Say goodbye to wasting time and hello to increased productivity with MagicRecap.
